channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Five Quotes from Financial History to Guide Trustees
item.description: If you serve as a trustee of an institutional investment plan, these five quotes may help guide your decisions for the benefit of those who depend on your stewardship.

item.title: 5 best supplements to support your mental health, according to a psychiatrist
item.description: Supplements may help you along your mental health journey; they are not a cure.

item.title: Stocks for the Long Run? Setting the Record Straight
item.description: Stocks are a good investment long-term, providing that you dial in your expectations. New historical findings provide a richer, more complete understanding of international returns.

item.title: Romance guild in upheaval following criticism over the way it handled an author who posted negative online comments about other writers
item.description: The group also faced criticism and withdrew an award for a book that included a sympathetic portrayal of a cavalry officer who participated in the slaughter of Lakota Indians.

item.title: Rethinking Retirement Planning Amidst Aging Demographic Frontiers
item.description: Forward-thinking approaches to policy and wealth management are needed to ensure a better financial future across generations and income brackets.

item.title: A former tech CEO announced a fake offer to buy Getty Images in order to boost its stock price, authorities say
item.description: Robert Scott Murray, former chief executive of the networking-equipment maker 3Com, sold his Getty stock for about $1.5 million, officials said.

item.title: Book Review: The New World Economy in 5 Trends
item.description: A diligent economist and an eclectic bookworm serve up an analysis of megatrends that will have the greatest impact on economies and investments: innovation, productivity, climate, multiglobalization, debt, and aging.

item.title: The best science-backed strategies for a strong mind as you age
item.description: The lifelong learner is onto something.

item.title: Factor Strategies Belong in Your Completion Portfolio Toolkit
item.description: Why wouldn't you include factor strategies in your completion portfolio? A review of the two commonly used approaches for managing institutional assets highlights their symbiotic nature.

item.title: Billionaire Bill Ackman is about to get $4 billion richer as his hedge fund Pershing Square expects a funding round at a premium valuation
item.description: Pershing Square could go public as soon as 2025.
